name: Macaroni and Sausage
description: Velveeta mac and cheese with sliced up, pan cooked chicken sausage for additional protein.
instructions: Slice the chicken sausage into thin pieces and toss into a skillet with low heat. You can add a little oil if you want but it probably doesn't need it depending on the fat content.
Start cooking both boxes of pasta according to the instructions.
Once pasta is done, drain, add cheese sauces.
Add in extra seasonings like garlic powder and onion powder if you want. Probably some black pepper too. Cumin brings this dish to life.
Add in the sausage once they are hot.
Cover the pan and let it get hot all the way through. The heat and pressure will activate the delicious flavors.
